location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No 1 from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire Residency to Gilbert Moore [More], Secretary to the Government, Commercial Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing a statement on the trade of Bushire (not present) for 1823 'carried on in British bottoms', and a letter (also not present) from Henry Willock, HM Charg√© d'affaires at Tehran on the subject of Persian trade. It also offers a possible explanation for why imports at Bushire have fallen compared with 1822.
